modName: The Women Of Ghost Hunters Racemenu Preset Pack
summary: Five racemenu presets that include the likeness of five sexy women who were on the SyFy channel reality television franchise "ghost hunters".
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff00ff][b]This download is a preset pack for the racemenu mod that features seven beautiful/sexy
women from the SyFy channel's "ghost hunters" reality television show
franchise.[/b]
 
[b]*Kris Williams (ghost hunters/ghost hunters international)[/b]
[b]*Amy Bruni (ghost hunters) [/b]
[b]*Michelle Tate (ghost hunters/ghost hunters academy)[/b]
[b]*Heathyr Hoffman (ghost hunters academy)[/b]
[b]*Ashley Troub (ghost hunters)[/b]
[b]*Jane Riley (ghost hunters academy)[/b]
[b]*Susan Slaughter (ghost hunters academy/ghost hunters international)[/b]
 [/color]
[color=#ff0000][b]===REQUIREMENTS===
*SKSE 1.7.2 or above
*Racemenu (latest version)
*SG Female Eyebrows
*The Eyes Of Beauty
*True Eyes
*True Brows
*ApachiiSkyhair
*HHairstyles
*Better Vanilla Hairs Mesh Replacements
*[b]SG Hair Pack 268 Edition (google this mod to find the download location, it is not anywhere on nexus or loverslab)[/b]
[b]*Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC[/b][/b]
 
Make 100% sure that you have the above mods installed before playing this or else this will not work properly![/color]
 
[color=#00ffff][b]===Optional/Recommended===
Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP
Bracelets By Ezuka
Sexy Swimsuit and bikinis for CBBE
Wedding Rings By Ezuka
FNIS Sexy Walk/FNIS 5.2[/b]
[b]Xenius Character Enhancement Compilation[/b][/color]
 
[color=#00ff00][b]==INSTALLATION==[/b]
[b]Step 1. Save this download file onto your desktop, go into the directory [i]my computer/local disk/program files x86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets[/i] and copy and paste the files contained in this download into there.[/b]
 
[b]Step 2.Boot the game up, go into racemenu by typing "showracemenu" in the
console, then click "presets" on the bar in the top right of the screen,
and press F9 to load presets (they should be in there) and voila, there
you are![/b]
 [/color][color=#ffff00]
Please share your screenshots and/or videos, I would love to see them!
[/color]
author: Kutt
